triples.name: R package
triples.relevance: The paper proposes ggstatsplot, a new R package that enriches ggplot2-based visualizations with embedded statistical analysis results.

triples.name: Ggplot2
triples.relevance: The ggstatsplot package builds upon and extends ggplot2 for creating statistical visualizations.

triples.name: R (programming language)
triples.relevance: The ggstatsplot package is implemented in R as its execution platform.

triples.name: Data visualization
triples.relevance: Creating information-rich graphics is the core task the paper addresses.

triples.name: Statistics
triples.relevance: Statistical analysis and testing are embedded within the visualizations to validate models.

triples.name: Statistical model
triples.relevance: The paper addresses detecting problems in statistical models and validating their assumptions through visualization.
